creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
life_date: Hokushū, Japanese, fl. c. 1808–1832; Honya Seishichi, Publisher
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
text: Related to the play Keisei setsugekka けいせい雪月花, performed at the Osaka Kado Theater in the 1st lunar month 1830.
title: Actor Ichikawa Hakuen II (Ichikawa Danjūrō VII) as Saeda Masaemon
